name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As an AI Software Engineer with 8 years of full stack development experience, I possess strong expertise in **Python**, **FastAPI**, and microservices architecture, crucial for developing scalable AI solutions. My technical skill set also includes **Flask**, **event-driven architecture**, and technologies such as **Kafka**, **SSE**, and **WebSocket**. My experience encompasses working with Large Language Models (LLMs) including **GPT**, **Claude**, and **Gemini**, as well as proficiency in fine-tuning, prompt engineering, and employing **vector databases** like **OpenSearch** and **FAISS**. I've implemented Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) systems and developed AI agents, leveraging **OpenAI Chat Completion** and Assistant endpoints.

In addition to my technical capabilities, I have successfully led enterprise-grade platform development projects in healthcare and finance, integrating machine learning capabilities for predictive analytics. I maintain a strong foundation in developing robust applications that align with compliance standards such as HIPAA and PCI DSS, and I possess hands-on experience with CI/CD automation and MLOps workflows using **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**. My excellent problem-solving, communication, and collaboration skills further enhance my ability to deliver high-quality solutions.
